• Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game with procedurally generated maps and real-time player interaction.
  • Features include vehicle customization, resource mining, building structures, trading, and a shop system for upgrades.
  • Supports both desktop and mobile controls, with admin tools for server management and cloud save functionality.
    const TILE_PROPS = { [TILE_TYPES.DIRT]: { name: "Dirt", color: '#5d4037', hardness: 0.5, value: 0, tier: 0 } };
    const GameEngine = class { constructor() { this.localPlayer = { id: uuid(), gridX: CONSTANTS.MAP_WIDTH/2, gridY: 4, inventory: {} }; } };

Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game where players explore procedurally generated underground worlds, mine resources, build structures, and trade with others. The game features vehicle customization, a shop system for upgrades, and supports both desktop and mobile controls. Admins can manage servers, while cloud saves enable cross-device gameplay. Players can discover teleporters, craft items, and engage in real-time interactions with others in shared mining environments.
